examples.example: 在学校的失物认领处，丢失物品的同学都顺利找回了属于自己的东西。

translate.english: At the lost and found office of the school, the classmates who lost items have all successfully retrieved the things that belong to them.

examples.example: 我在公交车上捡到一个钱包，交给了司机师傅以便进行失物认领。

translate.english: I picked up a wallet on the bus and handed it to the driver for the lost and found.

examples.example: 当有人在商场广播说有失物认领时，一位女士高兴地跑过去领回了自己丢失的项链。

translate.english: When someone said on the shopping mall radio that there was a lost item to claim, a lady happily ran over to claim back her lost necklace.
